Package eu.anorien.mhl

Interface Summary
Event An event represents something which occurred in the world at some point in time.
Fact A fact is a "piece" of the state of the world.
Factory The Factory allows the application to create the necessary data structures for using the library.
HypothesesManager This is the class which controls most of the behavior of the library.
Hypothesis This hypothesis is created by the library when the application requests the best, or all the hypotheses maintained by the library.
MayBeRequiredPredicate Following the cluster splitting operation, it is possible that some clusters are created containing only events and/or facts which will never be requested for an hypothesis generation.
MHLService The access point for using the library.
Watcher The application may register a Watcher, using the register method of the HypothesesManager class to: watch for changes in the events and facts maintained by the library; receive confirmed facts (with probability of 1); receive the current best hypothesis when it changes.
